welcome_message_body: Welcome to Innsbruck, where the stunning alpine scenery meets rich history and charming architecture. Get ready to explore the city's famous landmarks, indulge in its vibrant culture, and immerse yourself in the beauty of the Tyrolean region. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: die Wilderin
restaurants.description: die Wilderin is a austrian restaurant located in Innsbruck.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Innsbruck-kranebitten Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Innsbruck-kranebitten Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
